sub_title: Business Development and Relationship Manager, Area Sales Manager, Business and Legal Adviser in Russia and CIS
summary:
My specialization is Russia, CIS countries, Ukraine,Kazakhstan, Baltic countries, EMEA, Chine, India regions

 As you will see from my CV in addition to my University degree in Law and native Russian I have more than 10  years of extensive experience working with senior government officials, private sector leaders, and other public policy professionals in Russia and the CIS countries in an international business environment at any level of clients, including IT sector, have an excellent network with regional Russian authorities, have been responsible for building, developing and maintaining long-lasting relationships with regional government officials, ministries and key clients from scratch, contracts and prices negotiation, 
Reported to the Director of EMEA, intensively worldwide travelled.

Have excellent commercial and negotiation, sales, presentation, international communication and relationships building skills, knowledge of international contracts, excellent experience  to communicate with different level of clients, from company board level to working floor, well organized and decision maker, ambitious and driven, flexible,work with creativity, self-starter and self-motivated, good analytical and problem solving abilities, have a “can do” mentality, work independently and in an international team, excellent experience to work under pressure and manage multiple tasks.

profile_positions.description:
KEY QUALIFICATIONS
Have been responsible for:
•	providing the highest clients support in Russia and CIS countries, also in EMEA region
•	establishing, developing and maintaining close relationships and contacts at any level of clients on assigned regions from scratch
•	recognize sales opportunities and convert them into sales
•	answering client requests through different channels within the set Service Level Agreement
•	handle customer requests and provides solutions – we must go from the customers’ needs
•	work closely with the other departments to ensure that clients’ existing and upcoming needs are met
•	respect processes and procedures, actively contribute to the development of the company by providing constructive input
•	provide exceptional communication in all areas of day to day activities to the customers and the company’s headquarters 
•	meetings with clients periodically with a view to review the existing business relationship, identify customer needs and internal requirements
•	Reported to Director of EMEA

Client Relations Advisor 
Independent- I have more than 10  years of extensive experience working with senior government officials, private sector leaders, and other public policy professionals in Russia and the CIS countries in an international business environment at any level of clients, including IT sector, have an excellent network with regional Russian authorities, have been responsible for building, developing and maintaining long-lasting relationships with regional government officials, ministries and key clients from scratch, contracts and prices negotiation,
profile_positions.title: Relationship and Account Manager / Business and Legal Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Delta Electronics Europe–hardware product:The NL, Russia, CIS, Germany, Taiwan, UK
Client Relations Advisor/BD and Area Sales Manager
Succeeded in expansion the company’s products to Russia and CIS, EE and EMEA markets through sales, contracts and price negotiation, establishing, developing and maintaining relationship with customers from scratch including market research, contracts and price negotiation, identified key competitors, negotiated possible acquisition of competitors’ business, presentation and implementation of company and the products, reported to the Director of EMEA

July2005-January2007	
Nokia/Solectron–software product:The NL,Russia,CIS,Taiwan
Client Relations Advisor/ BD and Area Sales Manager
Introduced of Nokia/Solectron software product into Russia and CIS market. Trained and coordinated 6 Repair Centers and 490 Service Centres. Increased a number of partner Service Centers in Russia and CIS by 30 per cent, total in 490 Service Centres. Provided full administrative support to new partners and established network, presentation and implementation of the company products, trained customers on company operational tools

April2004-July2005 
Master Card :The NL, Russia,CIS,Baltic countries,Georgia,Africa
Client Relations Advisor/ BD and Area Sales Manager
Successfully expanded Master Card products into Russia and CIS which involved building up the relationship with top managers of 22 main Russian, CIS and Baltic countries banks as well as developing good working relationship with local Governmental Officials, provide customer support on orders and operational inquiries, work with Siebel-7

Aug.2002-April2004 
AAF–Industrial AIR filters:The NL, Russia,CIS	
Client Relations Advisor/BDMr
Have been responsible for expansion of AAF products into Russian speaking markets, for establishing, maintaining and developing relationship with clients from scratch, for contracts and prices negotiation, reported to the General Manager of Europe

Ratibor OJSC –  Russia, UK, the Middle East, India
